mapper.insert: insert into students (xh, xm, xslb, cym, ywxm, xbm, rxny, rxnj, csrq, csdd, bjdm, sg, tz, zydm, yxdm, sfzx, jg, sfzlx, sfzjh, sfzyxq, hyzk, xyzj, jkzk, zzmm, mz, xx, wx, qq, dh, dszn, xjzt) values (#{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rxny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rxnj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sfzjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzyxq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xyzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jkzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dszn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xjzt,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update students set xm = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xslb = #{xslb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cym = #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ywxm = #{ywxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xbm = #{xbm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rxny = #{rxny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rxnj = #{rxnj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csrq = #{csrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, csdd = #{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjdm = #{bjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sg = #{sg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tz = #{tz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zydm = #{zydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yxdm = #{yxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfzx = #{sfzx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jg = #{jg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfzlx = #{sfzlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sfzjh = #{sfzjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfzyxq = #{sfzyxq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hyzk = #{hyzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xyzj = #{xyzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jkzk = #{jkzk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zzmm = #{zzmm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mz = #{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xx = #{xx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx = #{wx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dh = #{dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dszn = #{dszn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xjzt = #{xjzt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select xh, xm, xslb, cym, ywxm, xbm, rxny, rxnj, csrq, csdd, bjdm, sg, tz, zydm, yxdm, sfzx, jg, sfzlx, sfzjh, sfzyxq, hyzk, xyzj, jkzk, zzmm, mz, xx, wx, qq, dh, dszn, xjzt from students where xh = #{xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select xh, xm, xslb, cym, ywxm, xbm, rxny, rxnj, csrq, csdd, bjdm, sg, tz, zydm, yxdm, sfzx, jg, sfzlx, sfzjh, sfzyxq, hyzk, xyzj, jkzk, zzmm, mz, xx, wx, qq, dh, dszn, xjzt from students
